section: This Agreement be deemed effective as of the Effective Date, Agreement and shall terminate on December 31, 2020, unless terminated earlier in accordance with Section 3.2.
explanation: The sentence structure is flawed. It should read, "This Agreement shall be deemed effective as of the Effective Date and shall terminate on December 31, 2020, unless terminated earlier in accordance with Section 3.2."

section: Upon termination of this Agreement in its entirety pursuant to Section 3.1, all obligations of the Parties hereto shall terminate, except for the provisions of Section 2.2, and the entirety of Sections 4, 5 and 6, which shall survive any termination or expiration of this Agreement.
explanation: Section 2.2 describes “Terms of Payment and Related Matters”. It does not make logical sense that those terms would survive termination, as payment should no longer be required after the termination of the agreement. All obligations of the parties should terminate, not continue.

section: TELCOSTAR PTE. LTD 6 Eu Tong Sen Street Tel Aviv, Israel, 6770007 #10-15 The Central Singapore 059817
explanation: The address listed is for both Tel Aviv, Israel, and Singapore. This does not make sense. There should be two separate addresses listed, one for each location.
